de.unihannover.se.iviewxjava.iviewx.eyetracker

Class ETCalibrationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unihannover.se.iviewxjava.iviewx.eyetracker.ETCalibrationManager

  • public class ETCalibrationManager
extends Object
    Manages the calibration process for the RED-m eyetracker.

    Currently only automatic calibration is supported.
    Manipulating the calibration settings is not supported yet.

    There can be only one active calibration at a time.
    Having multiple instances of this class will result in unintuitive behavior because of shared internal state. Please use the IViewX class as a central access point.

    • Method Detail

      • calibrate

        public void calibrate()
        Starts the automatic calibration.

        A new window will open, which will present the user with points to fixate on. The user might be required to hit the Spacebar button when fixating the first point to start the calibration process.

        Throws:
        ETException - If an error occurred during the calibration process
        ETConnectionException - If no connection could be established to the eyetracker
